attributes.action: President Donald Trump for GCB (Highest Honour from the Queen)
attributes.background: Her Majesty the Queen to bestow upon President Donald Trump the highest Honour Her Majesty can bestow on an American.  The Knight Grand Cross of the Most Honourable Order of the Bath (GCB) for services to freedom and common law.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
